mapper.sql: id, category_id as categoryId, yanyu, geyao, gushi, jinji, qiyu, dancantuce, content, pic, created, updated
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM area_content AS a
AND a.categoryId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pageParams.categoryId},'%')
LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM area_content AS a
AND a.categoryId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{categoryId},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO area_content ( category_id, yanyu, geyao, gushi, jinji, qiyu, dancantuce, content, pic, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{yanyu}, #{geyao}, #{gushi}, #{jinji}, #{qiyu}, #{dancantuce}, #{content}, #{pic}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
from area_content as a where a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE area_content as a SET a.category_id=#{categoryId}, a.yanyu=#{yanyu}, a.geyao=#{geyao}, a.gushi=#{gushi}, a.jinji=#{jinji}, a.qiyu=#{qiyu}, a.dancantuce=#{dancantuce}, a.content=#{content}, a.pic=#{pic}, a.updated=#{updated} WHERE a.id= #{id}
